mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, menu_code as menuCode, authority_button_code as authorityButtonCode, user_flag as userFlag, detail_button as detailButton, scope_code as scopeCode FROM uq_authority_menu where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and scope_code = #{organizationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.menu_code as menuCode, b.authority_button_code as authorityButtonCode, b.authority_button_name as authorityButtonName, b.menu_button_code as menuButtonCode, b.menu_button_name as menuButtonName, b.authority_button_name_en as authorityButtonNameEn from uq_function_menu_button a LEFT JOIN uq_authority_combinate_button b on a.authority_button_code = b.authority_button_code

select id,menu_code as menuCode,title,path,parent_code as parentCode,menu_type as menuType,order_number as orderNumber, level_number as levelNumber,icon,name,redirect,component,is_valid as isValid,relate_flow as relateFlow,no_drop_down as noDropdownVal,keep_alive as keepAliveVal,hidden as hiddenVal,is_home as isHome,path_routing as pathRouting from uq_function_menu a where is_valid = 1 order by order_number
